HOME.ONE_TIME_SECRET_MESSAGING_SUBTITLE: Chhiar leh a hmel loh chuan a hmu a, a hma lo!
HOME.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY: Stellar Security chuan a chhuak leh a pakhat a hman
HOME.WITHOUT_TRACE_DESCRIPTION: I chhantu chu a hlauhawm a hmu a, chhinchhawn leh in chhuak a phal bawk. Kan IP address, chu in chhuak chhuak leh a hmu chuan a ni a, chuan chhanchhuak zungzaw lo hmu a.
HOME.PRIVACY_PROTECTED_DESCRIPTION: Secret a hmu theih chuan i chhuak zawng lo. Chhinchhawn hman chuan password a thil a, a hmu leh a hman a chhuak. A chhan lo, 14 ni chhung a chhuak a.
HOME.END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_DESCRIPTION: Links leh content tura hash a chhuak a, kan hriat lo. Chutih rawn a hmu chi hrang a, ID 36 a pawisa chi a hmu leh a hmu chhuak a, AES-256 encryption hman a.
HOME.STEP_1_TITLE: I message a chhuak leh password a a hmu
HOME.SHARE_DESCRIPTION_PART_1: Message a chhuak leh a hmu a, a hmu a ni lo.
HOME.SHARE_DESCRIPTION_PART_2: A hmu leh a hmu a chhuak.
HOME.SHARE_ENCRYPTED_BY: Stellar Security chuan a chhuak leh a pakhat a hman
HOME.SHARE_TEXTAREA_PLACEHOLDER: I Secret message, password, loh chhuak chhuak *
HOME.CREATED_SUBTITLE: A hmu a chhuak ang a hmu a
HOME.CREATED_TITLE_SHARE: Link a copy leh a hmu.
